title.rendered: Financial Commission Participating in Finance Magnates London Summit

content.rendered:
Come see our Exhibitor Booth № L2 at Finance Magnates London Summit this November in London!

The Financial Commission will be exhibiting at the 2017 Finance Magnates London Summit which will take place on 14-15 November, 2017 at 1 Old Billingsgate Walk, London, UK, EC3R 6DX.

The organization joins a list of more than 2000 attendees, 64 Industry Professional Speakers and over 100 confirmed exhibitors and representatives from hundreds of financial services providers starting from the biggest IBs to top-tier retail brokers, asset managers, technology leaders, banks, hedge funds and regtech start-ups expected to attend the exclusive industry gathering.

The Importance of Industry Events:

As the trading space is shifting on both the retail and institutional levels, this massive event brings together influencers and decision-makers to discuss all the hot topics and share actionable experience and insight with thousands of attendees.

The announcement follows prior events that the Financial Commission participated in including in Cyprus, Hong Kong, England, Russia, Belarus, Ukraine and Shanghai.

Participation in the Finance Magnates London Summit event supports the industry and provides market participants with the chance to learn more about how the Financial Commission operates.

This includes how the organization is helping its members improve the services they offer to clients using a 3rd party dispute resolution process afforded via membership status within the Financial Commission as well as using Financial Commission’s certification services including ICO and technology certification

  • The London summit will feature unique networking opportunities, focused panel discussions and a diverse range of exhibitors from the financial services space.
  • There will be top executives of the leading cutting edge marketing firms, technology, payments, service and trading platform providers from Europe, Asia and across the world.
  • The event supports various aspects of the financial services space in foreign exchange and related markets through various collaborative means covering a wide range of topics from Marketing and how to improve client acquisition to Technology and industry innovation.
  • The Financial Commission will demonstrate its value to participants through its exhibitor booth № L2 where representatives from the organization will explain the benefits provided by Financial Commission membership and certification services.

In addition, the Financial Commission expects to meet new market participants who could be potential candidate member firms, including Forex, CFD and Cryptocurrency related brokerages and technology developers.

Financial Commission Chief Operating Officer, Nikolai Isayev said: “We are excited to once again participate in the largest annual gathering of industry professionals to share our insights and new Financial Commission services. I’m personally looking forward to meeting our members and prospects to collaborate, find new opportunities and continue to improve our industry.”

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org
